original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields close steady ahead of t-bill auction
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields closed steady on Tuesday ahead of a bill auction, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 32.00/20 percent, steady from 31.75/32.00 percent on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 28.00/30 percent, steady from 28.00/10 percent on Monday.
Debt office said 120,000 million rupees worth of treasury bills will be issued at an auction on Wednesday. (Colombo/ Mar 14/2023)
